author: Macy Williams
title: 33 Tattoos That Prove How Powerful 1 Word Can Be
text: Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 33 Tattoos That Prove How Powerful 1 Word Can Be Sometimes all it takes is one simple word to get your message across. Being concise is powerful and confident. We think tattoos with just a single word truly stand out. If you're looking to get inked , let these ideas inspire you to make your own statement. 37802431,40671353
